bibl.title: Aegyptiaca Romana. Nilotic Scenes and the Roman Views of Egypt. (Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 144.)
bibl.note: Diss. Leiden Univ., 2001. - I. Introduction. - II. Corpus Figurarum Niloticarum [see in part. pp. 197-200, Nos 099-101: Egypt]. - III. Nilotic scenes in the Roman world. Interpretation and contextualisation. - IV. Roman Aegyptiaca. - V. The Roman discourse on Egypt reconstructed. - Tables. Appendix. Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: VERSLUYS M.J., Aegyptiaca Romana. Nilotic Scenes and the Roman Views of Egypt. (Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 144.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2002, 8°, xiv-509 pp., 7 tabl., 171 figg. ISBN 90-04-12440-3. €125.
